to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
Tailai county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: The darkest hour is that before the dawn.
sentences.chinese: 黎明之前是最黑暗的时刻，否极泰来。

sentences.english: but don't forget the times your luck has turned.
sentences.chinese: 但不要健忘你否极泰来的时辰。

sentences.english: Kindness in mind, incenses in hands, sincerely pray for blessings.
sentences.chinese: 心存善念，手存香，虔诚膜拜，求泰来。

sentences.english: You should also consider refinancing if your credit score or financial situation improves.
sentences.chinese: 你也应该考虑如果你的信用得分或财务融资否极泰来。

sentences.english: When you encounter unfortunate, think of fortunes.
sentences.chinese: 当你遇到不幸时，想着否极泰来。

sentences.english: And the voice is telling me that things have changed a lot.
sentences.chinese: 这声音告诉我一切已不一样了，即指否极泰来。

sentences.english: A good bhe darkest hour is that before the dawn.
sentences.chinese: 黎明之前是最黑暗的时刻，否极泰来。

sentences.english: Teleki at once denounced Werth's action as treasonable.
sentences.chinese: 泰来基立即指责韦特的行为是叛国。

definition: sunlight/(Wu dialect) time of the day/moment
